720340f-a.text:
Harrison Street, east from Greenwich to Hudson Streets; shown on the latter are portions of Nos. 94-84 and 82-78.
November 9, 1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Art Project.

720216f-a.text:

June 2, 1937

Five boroughs Project
"El" on Greenwhich Street and south from Harrison Street.
